name: JPstatus
tag_list: ecommerce, arizona, phoenix, minimalist, minimalism, japanese, asian, bed, shikifuton, shikibuton, simplicity, back-pain, sleep, health
overview:
JPstatus is an online boutique shop delivering the elegant simplicity of Japanese living to the contemporary Western household. The JPstatus Shikifuton is a Japanese cotton mattress that is comfortable, compact and versatile in any setting. Headquartered in Tempe, Arizona, JPstatus products are available internationally through its website www.jpstatus.com.

Furthermore, JPstatus has innovated eCommerce software to create an “Apple Store”-like shopping experience for customers. Unique features developed by JPstatus enable a frictionless checkout experience such as single-page checkout (Slide Cart) and seamless form validations.

The name JPstatus is short for “Japan status.” The company is currently based in Tempe, Arizona.

external_links.title: How an Ambitious Startup Wants to Revolutionize the Way You Sleep
